titleInfo.title: Corpus-driven development of a Gesture Typology based on the Bielefeld Speech and Gesture Alignment Corpus

mods.abstract: We introduce the multimodal Bielefeld Speech and Gesture Alignment (SaGA) corpus, its design, structure, and approaches to a data-driven development and validation of a gesture typology.
